rooms.description: Main entrance hall with ample space to accommodate wheelchair accessibility, featuring low thresholds and ramps.
Spacious living area with a central Chettinad-style motif, natural lighting through large windows aligned according to Vastu (south-east and north-west openings) to enhance energy flow.
Open dining area adjacent to the kitchen with wheelchair-accessible pathways and minimal barriers in design.
Functional kitchen designed for efficient workflow with provisions for wheelchair accessibility including adjustable countertops.
Guest bedroom equipped with a spacious layout and essential amenities, ensuring easy access for mobility devices.
Primary bedroom offering luxury finishes in Chettinad style with en-suite bathroom and dedicated walk-in closet, all designed following Vastu guidelines for auspicious placement.
Luxurious ensuite bathroom integrated into the master bedroom area with accessible fixtures and ample maneuvering space.
Dedicated home office designed for both functionality and comfort. Wheelchair-accessible workspace with adjustable desk height and integrated storage solutions.

openings.description: Large accessible entrance featuring automatic door system for ease of use by wheelchair users. Aligned with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Large windows in the living room to facilitate natural light and maintain a connection with nature per Chettinad aesthetics.
Window ensuring bright and airy dining space with proper ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.
Windows in the kitchen for natural light and ventilation. Designed to follow local building norms.
